Package net.minecraft.src.forge

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IArrowLooseHandler  
    IArrowNockHandler  
    IBonemealHandler  
    IBucketHandler  
    IChunkLoadHandler
    Register an implementation of this interface to be used for chunk load handling.
    IConnectionHandler  
    IConnectRedstone
    This interface is to be implemented by Block classes.
    ICraftingHandler  
    IDestroyToolHandler  
    IEntityInteractHandler  
    IGuiHandler  
    IHoeHandler  
    IMinecartCollisionHandler
    This class defines a replacement for the default minecart collision code.
    IMinecartHandler  
    IMultipassRender
    This interface is to be implemented by a Block class.
    IOreHandler
    The current list of known classes.
    IOverrideReplace
    This interface is to be implemented by block classes.
    IPacketHandler  
    IPickupHandler  
    IShearable
    This allows for mods to create there own Shear-like items and have them interact with Blocks/Entities without extra work.
    ISidedInventory
    Inventory ranges mapped by side.
    ISleepHandler  
    ISpawnHandler
    A interface for Entities that need extra information to be communicated between the server and client when they are spawned.
    ISpecialArmor
    This interface is to be implemented by ItemArmor classes.
    ISpecialResistance
    This interface is to be implemented by block classes.
    ITextureProvider
    This interface has to be implemented either by an instance of Block or Item.
    IThrowableEntity
    This interface should be implemented by an Entity that can be 'thrown', like snowballs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmorProperties  
    Configuration
    This class offers advanced configurations capabilities, allowing to provide various categories for configuration variables.
    DimensionManager  
    DungeonLoot
    Used to hold a list of all items that can be spawned in a world dungeon
    EntityTrackerInfo  
    EnumHelper  
    ForgeHooks  
    ForgeHooksServer  
    MessageManager  
    MinecartKey
    Used to create hashmap values for Minecart/type pairs Written by CovertJaguar
    MinecraftForge  
    MinecraftForge.OreQuery  
    NetworkMod
    This is for mods that are designed to be used on the server side alone, or both the client and server side.
    ObjectPair<T1,T2>
    A class that holds two generic values, can be used as a Key/Value pair, but is used in forge as a frequency/object pair.
    PacketHandlerServer  
    Property
